name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Podcast Hero, Best Podcasts and Search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Podcast Hero, Best Podcasts and Search  By HBM Edison, Ltd

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Podcast Hero a lightweight and useful New Tab Extension designed for getting quick and easy access to Podcasts and an accessible web search (provided by Bing.com) right in the comfort of your web browser.

The search features use within the extension will be provided by Bing; however, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting. 

*
Please read carefully: by installing the Podcast Hero Extension , you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy.

About Us: https://trypodcasthero.com/about-us/
End-User License Agreement: http://trypodcasthero.com/eula/
Privacy Policy: http://trypodcasthero.com/privacy-policy-2/
